about_the_game:
“In fear I trust” 3rd Episode Iron and Rust


“In fear I trust” 3rd Episode tells us about the strange events at the local factory. They took place when the player used to work there. The mysterious deaths, the mysterious inspectors. Advancing the episode, the player tries to find out what is really going on and how this is related to VERSA company. Why are people dying on a scheduled basis?
